text:
@WhiteHouse Supporting small busonesses my Ass!

A digital technology company that is working for President Donald Trump's re-election campaign received $2.85 million in aid through the paycheck protection program--nearly 14 times the current PPP average of $206,000. https://t.co/tgJepFpxWo
